des:
Alexa, turn on light
Alexa, turn on group light
Alexa, what is the temperature in the thermometer?
=================================

A. In GalaThings APP Setting.
B. In Amazon Alexa APP Setting.
C. How to say.
D. Set Group.

A. In GalaThings APP Setting.
 1. Install GalaThings APP in your phone.
 2. Run GalaThings App.
 3. Go to [Home]->[Setting]->[User Information]->[Bind account].
 4. You MUST bind your account.
 5. Return to [Home].
 6. Press [Add a Device] and add a Mercu.
 7. After Mercu add successful. You can add other devices. [Optional]
 8. Close GalaThings APP.

B. In Amazon Alexa APP Setting.
 1. Open Amazon Alexa APP.
 2. Go to [Setting]->[Skills].
 3. Search GalaThings or Mercu.
 4. Select [GalaThings: Smart Home]. Press [Enable].
 5. It will pop GalaThings login page.
 6. Use GalaThings bind account to login.
 7. After login successful. Close the page.
 8. Discover your device. You can say: Alexa, discover.
 9. Go to [Settings]->[Smart Home]->[Devices].
10. You can find your device name.

C. How to say.
* Alexa, turn on light
* Alexa, turn off light
* Alexa, what is the temperature of the thermometer?
* Alexa, what is the temperature in the thermometer?

* Alexa, turn on (device name)
* Alexa, turn off (device name)
* Alexa, what is the temperature of (my/the) (device name)? 
* Alexa, what is the temperature in (my/the) (device name)? 
* Alexa, what is the temperature in here? 
* Alexa, what is the temperature in (my/the) house?

D. Set Group.
 You can use Alexa groups to control multiple devices.
* Alexa, turn on group light.
* Alexa, turn off group light.
* Alexa, what is the temperature in the group?

* Alexa, turn on (group name)
* Alexa, turn off (group name)
* Alexa, what is the temperature of (my/the) (group name)? 
* Alexa, what is the temperature in (my/the) (group name)? 


Learn more about how Alexa works with this skill.
